name: The Mud Man
description:
You play as an old man called Jasper who's an alcoholic, you leave the keys out and keep hearing noises, you think its just because you are drunk, but are they? Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse Left and Right - Look/Flashlight On And Off

ESC - Exit

Credits 

https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/decraniated-low-poly-retro-pixel-2e551e0991e1474... - Enemy 

https://elegantcrow.itch.io - Nature and House

https://ggbot.itch.io/psx-style-cars - Cars
